result.arabic_text: بَدِيعُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَإِذَا قَضَىٰٓ أَمۡرٗا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
result.translation: 117. Yalli usuk tookomc ceelallo maleh Qimbok (Awwuqtak) qaranwaa kee Baaxo gine Rabbi kinni, caagiidak caagidik teyna meklam faxe kaa tekkek, Toysa cagalah tik kaak iyyaah edde yakke.
